concept.title: What is division of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn what division is.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of dividing numbers, you need to know what division is. "Division" means breaking a total into smaller parts.
In mathematical operation, it is a process that splits a number into smaller equal numbers.
You use the division symbol (รท) to express the division operation in the app.
